actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to provide for authorization of disaster recovery planning by the Secretary of Commerce.

summary.text: Amends the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to transfer authority to provide financial assistance to economy recovery planning councils for disaster areas from the President to the Secretary of Commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to provide for authorization of disaster recovery planning by the Secretary of Commerce.
